title: Toronto Cocktail
full_text:
Toronto Cocktail
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
rye whiskey
1/4
ounce
Fernet Branca
1/4
ounce
simple syrup
2
dashes
Angostura bitters
Directions
Combine rye, Fernet, simple syrup, and bitters in a mixing glass and fill with cracked ice. Stir for 20 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
Cocktail strainer
,
bar spoon
